thread.title: Confession of jealous boyfriend who killed Chinese heiress | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Confession of jealous boyfriend who killed Chinese heiress | Daily Mail Online

author: Richard Spillett
title: Confession of jealous boyfriend who killed Chinese heiress | Daily Mail Online
text: 'I just lost it': Chilling confession of violent jealous boyfriend who battered his millionaire Chinese heiress partner to death with his bare fists Xixi Bi murdered by Jordan Matthews in vicious, sustained and prolonged attack Interview footage shows the chef describing how he beat his girlfriend in a row 'Brilliant' Chinese student killed by her 'gutless' boyfriend after months of abuse She was due to take over the family's multi-million pound business in Nanjing Matthews admitted manslaughter but denied murder - but a jury convicted him Mrs Justice Davies jailed him for life and must serve minimum of 18 years
